Common.Error_General: We are experiencing difficulties on our end. Please, try again.

Page_Start.Download_App: Download the app to get started

Page_Discover.Tag_Found: You just discovered something here! Would you like to see?

Page_View.Alert_Flag_Message: Did you find something inappropriate or illegal? Let us know so we can have it reviewed.
Page_View.Alert_Flagged_Message: Thank you. We will be reviewing this content shortly.

Page_Help.Title: How can we help you?
Page_Help.SubTitle: You have questions, suggestions, maybe even complaints. We have an attentive ear. How can we help?
Page_Help.Message: HushTags is nothing without you, our customers, fans, and advocates. We do our best to make sure that HushTags are for everyone, but mistakes are bound to be made. If there is anything we can do make your experience with our product more enjoyable, feel free to let us know. Use the form below to send us a message and let us know an email address to best get in touch with you. Alternatively, if your message is short and sweet, @ us on Twitter or Instagram. We’re always up for a little social.
Page_Help.Alert_Missing_Message: Please let us know the following: {{missing}}
Page_Help.Toast_Sent: We have your message, and will be contacting you shortly.

Dialog_Create.Title: Add Your Own Message!
Dialog_Create.Message: Did you know you can add your own message to this HushTag? Use the HushTags app to add messages and share media.

Service_Location.Alert_Permission_Title: We Would Like To Know Where You Found This
Service_Location.Alert_Permission_Message:
Knowing your location helps us and others know where messages may be found. We do not actively track your location, and your GPS is only used when HushTags are tapped.

Is this alright?
